name: Middle/Senior .Net full stack developer
description:
We are looking for an experienced Senior .NET Software Engineer to join the Retail billing Team within our core product – Boss Revolution.

You will work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product accounting for over 700 million minutes and 12 million transactions per month.

You'll be involved in developing the International Calling business and Retail Channel Portal used by millions of customers and thousands of B2B partners in 6 continents.

Primary responsibilities:

  • Software modules/services design, including REST APIs
  • Refactoring/maintenance for the existing legacy applications
  • Integrating with 3rd-party services
  • Ensuring a great user experience for our customers
  • DevOps activities related to launching and maintaining production systems in AWS
  • Maintaining CI/CD pipelines

We expect you to have:

  • Strong knowledge of C#, .net core
  • Basic knowledge of Angular (or any other modern frameworks)
  • Experience with SQL or NoSQL databases like OracleDb, MongoDB, etc
  • Knowledge of AWS infrastructure
  • Hands-on experience with Docker containers
  • Hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines
  • Good English (both oral and written) – B1 or higher.

Would be a nice bonus:

  • Basic knowledge of tools to provision and maintain infrastructure (Terraform/Terragrunt).
  • Container orchestrators (ECS/K8S).

We are pleased to offer you:

  • Remote work opportunity!
  • B2B employment.
  • 15 vacation days & 5 fully covered sick days without sick leave required per year.
  • First-class English lessons.

Few words about us:

IDT Corporation is an American telecommunications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ 1300 people across 20 countries, and have revenues over $1.5 billion.

We are not ”another big IT corporation” – we encourage and support any in-house entrepreneurs to develop their ideas into business action.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, includes Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT’s mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

It seems like you are interested if you are here, so let’s chat!
